Aerodynamic.name: Aerodynamic
Aerodynamic.effect: May spend up to 4 AP on bonus damage for melee attacks
Aerodynamic.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Asbestos Lining.name: Asbestos Lining
Asbestos Lining.effect: Ignore Energy damage from the Persistent damage effect
Asbestos Lining.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Ballistic Weave.name: Ballistic Weave
Ballistic Weave.description:
Ballistic polymer weave is an armor mod which improves the defensive abilities of some clothing items. A layer of this tough artificial fabric can be used as a lining in a variety of garments, giving them a limited ability to resist impacts, bullets, and energy blasts.

Knowledge of this recipe is possessed only by a few, and they share these secrets only occasionally. All ballistic weave mods are installed with the Repair skill.

BioCommMesh.name: BioCommMesh
BioCommMesh.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Blood Cleanser.name: Blood Cleanser
Blood Cleanser.effect: Re-roll addiction roll for addictive chems while armor is powered

Braced.name: Braced
Braced.effect: +2 to all damage resistances vs melee attacks
Braced.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Brawling.name: Brawling
Brawling.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Core Assembly.name: Core Assembly
Core Assembly.effect: While armor is powered, if you begin your turn and there is no AP in the group pool, add +1 AP

Cushioned.name: Cushioned
Cushioned.effect: +2 to Physical damage resistance vs falling damage
Cushioned.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Deep Pocketed.name: Deep Pocketed
Deep Pocketed.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Dense.name: Dense
Dense.effect: +4 to all damage resistances vs Blast weapons
Dense.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Emergency Protocols.name: Emergency Protocols
Emergency Protocols.effect: While armor is powered, if your current HP is below 1/4 of your maximum, add +1 to Defense and +3 to all damage resistances

Explosive Vent.name: Explosive Vent
Explosive Vent.effect: While the armor is powered, when you land from a height, you inflict 4 @fos[DC] damage to all creatures and damageable objects within Close range

Hydraulic Bracers.name: Hydraulic Bracers
Hydraulic Bracers.effect: While armor is powered, your unarmed attacks inflict +2 @fos[DC] damage

Internal Database.name: Internal Database
Internal Database.effect: Re-roll 1d20 on all INT tests while armor is powered

Jetpack.name: Jetpack
Jetpack.effect: When you move you may activate a jetpack by spending 1 charge; this allows you to move one additional zone (horizontally or vertically) or gain enough height for an impact landing

Kinetic Dynamo.name: Kinetic Dynamo
Kinetic Dynamo.effect: While armor is powered, when you suffer any damage (after reductions for damage resistances), add +1 to the group AP pool

Lead Lined.name: Lead Lined
Lead Lined.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Lighter Build.name: Lighter Build
Lighter Build.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Medic Pump.name: Medic Pump
Medic Pump.effect: While armor is powered, when yourHP are reduced to below 1/2 of your maximum, you immediately use a Stimpak, regaining 3 HP or treating one Injury.

Motion-Assist Servos.name: Motion-Assist Servos
Motion-Assist Servos.effect: Increase STR of armor frame to 13 while armor is powered

Muffled.name: Muffled
Muffled.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Optimized Bracers.name: Optimized Bracers
Optimized Bracers.effect: While armor is powered, you may spend up to 4 AP on bonus damage for melee attacks

Overdrive Servos.name: Overdrive Servos
Overdrive Servos.effect: While armor is powered, when you Sprint, you may spend +2 AP to move one additional zone

Padded.name: Padded
Padded.effect: +2 to all damage resistances vs Blast weapons
Padded.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Photovoltaic Plating.name: Photovoltaic Plating
Photovoltaic Plating.effect: +1 AP at the start of a scene if in direct sunlight (only applies once)

Pneumatic.name: Pneumatic
Pneumatic.effect: Stun damage effect requires 2+ Effects to be rolled to affect you
Pneumatic.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Pocketed.name: Pocketed
Pocketed.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Rad Scrubber.name: Rad Scrubber
Rad Scrubber.effect: Ignore radiation from Irradiated food or drink consumed while armor is powered

Reactive Plates.name: Reactive Plates
Reactive Plates.effect: While armor is powered, when you suffer damage from a melee or unarmed attack, you inflict Physical damage back to the attacker equal to half the damage total rolled

Rusty Knuckles.name: Rusty Knuckles
Rusty Knuckles.effect: Your unarmed attacks gain the Persistent damage effect

Sensor Array.name: Sensor Array
Sensor Array.effect: Re-roll 1d20 on all PER tests while armor is powered

Shadowed.name: Shadowed
Shadowed.effect:
Shadowed Armor

Many of the armor types listed in this section can be modified to become Shadowed. Shadowed armor has a darker, less-reflective surface to make it harder to see the wearer in dim light or darkness.

  • If you are wearing one or two pieces of Shadowed armor, you may ignore the first complication rolled on a Sneak test you attempt while in dim light or darkness.
  • If you are wearing three or more pieces of Shadowed armor, you may re-roll a single d20 on one Sneak test you attempt each scene while in dim light or darkness.
  • If you are wearing five or more pieces of Shadowed armor, you may re-roll a single d20 on any Sneak test you attempt while in dim light or darkness.

Torso armor counts as two pieces towards this. Shadowed armor does not provide any bonus if you are in a suit of Power Armor.

Shadowed Leather.name: Shadowed Leather
Shadowed Leather.effect:

Stabilized.name: Stabilized
Stabilized.effect: When you aim and make a ranged attack, +1 @fos[DC] to the attack's damage
Stabilized.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Stealth Boy.name: Stealth Boy
Stealth Boy.effect: You may activate a Stealth Boy (p.171) once per scene by spending 1 charge

Targeting HUD.name: Targeting HUD
Targeting HUD.effect: When you take the Aim minor action, you may take a second minor action for 0 AP while armor is powered

Tesla Bracers.name: Tesla Bracers
Tesla Bracers.effect: While armor is powered, your unarmed attacks inflict +2 @fos[DC] damage and now inflict Energy damage

Tesla Coils.name: Tesla Coils
Tesla Coils.effect: While armor is powered, whenever an enemy makes a melee attack against you, they suffer 4 @fos[DC] Energy damage

Titanium Plating.name: Titanium Plating
Titanium Plating.effect: +1 HP to Armor Piece (+2 to Torso)

Weighted.name: Weighted
Weighted.description: Armor Upgrades apply to all the types of armor except for Vault-Tec Security armor.  All Armor Upgrades are installed with the Repair skill.

Welded Rebar.name: Welded Rebar
Welded Rebar.effect: Enemies who attack you with a melee or unarmed attack and suffer a complication suffer 2 @fos[DC] damage

Winterized Coating.name: Winterized Coating
Winterized Coating.description:
Installed with the Repair skill.

Cannot be installed on X-01 Power Armor.
